abstractText: These three paper folios contain the Nairātmāguhyeśvarīmantradhāraṇī, a ritualistic text dedicated to the tantric goddess Nairātmā-Guhyeśvarī. It consists of a longer hṛdayamantra (heart-mantra) followed by a section with a description of the deity herself and further spells.
abstractShort: These three paper folios contain the Nairātmāguhyeśvarīmantradhāraṇī, a ritualistic text dedicated to the tantric goddess
title: Nairātmāguhyeśvarīmantradhāraṇī
